verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I come in simplicity
Longing for purity
To worship You
In spirit and truth
Only You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord strip it all away
'Til only You remain
I'm coming back
To my first love
Only You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You're the reason I sing
The reason I sing
Yes my heart will sing
How I love You
And forever I'll sing
Forever I'll sing
Yes my heart will sing
How I love You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I come with my broken song
To You the Perfect One
To worship You
In spirit and truth
Only You
Only You

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Give me a childlike heart
Lead me to where You are
Cause I'm coming back
To my first love
Only You

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:

The reason I sing
Yes my heart will sing
How I love You
And forever I'll sing
Forever I'll sing

How I love You

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
How I love You
How I love You
How I love You
My first love
